date.description: The date for which the retargeting data is being reported.

af_prt.description: The AppsFlyer partner responsible for the retargeting campaign.

media_source.description: The media source or platform where the retargeting campaign was run.

campaign.description: The name or ID of the retargeting campaign.

clicks.description: The total number of clicks generated by the retargeting campaign.

conversions.description: The total number of conversions attributed to the retargeting campaign.

conversion_type.description: The type of conversion being tracked (e.g., installs, in-app purchases).

conversion_rate.description: The percentage of clicks that resulted in conversions.

sessions.description: The total number of sessions generated by the retargeting campaign.

loyal_users.description: The number of existing or returning users engaged by the retargeting campaign.

loyal_users_rate.description: The percentage of total users reached by the campaign that are identified as loyal users.

total_cost.description: The total cost incurred for running the retargeting campaign.

average_ecpi.description: The average effective cost per install for the retargeting campaign.
